name: Basil, Ascetical Companion of Procopius
troparia: (Tone 1) Dweller of the wilderness and angel in the body,* you were a wonder-worker, our God-bearing father Basil!* You received heavenly gifts* through fasting, vigil and prayer:* Healing the sick and the souls of those drawn to you by faith:* Glory to Him Who gave you strength!* Glory to Him Who granted you a crown!* Glory to Him Who through you grants healing to all!
